title: New app to address healthcare needs
text:
New app to address healthcare needs 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Thursday 3rd September, 2015 
Now you can consult top doctors in India online and book an appointment with them as well thanks to a new app launched by TopDoctorsOnline.com (TDO). 
With tie-ups with up over 120 hospitals, several diagnostic and pathology chains as well as emergency services - which are accessible directly through the app - it claims to provide complete healthcare solutions. 
It provides live consultation service where users can chat or talk to doctors in real-time. 
"This service helps solve queries, gain better insight towards health problems and receive guidance with regards to precautions, booking appointments, first-aid and more," said co-founder and chairman of TDO, Bharat Bhardwaj. 
The 'live-chats' and 'doctor-on-call' feature reduces the wait-time between the doctor-patient interaction, thereby allowing the doctors to attend to more patients from across the country. 
Users can receive guidance from in-house doctors over the app and when required can book appointments with local specialists and leading experts across India. 
The app can be downloaded from the Google Play Store. More Technology Industry News
